entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
